subsection_content: Most of the time, varicocele has no specific symptoms. Occasionally, it can cause mild pain or a feeling of heaviness in the scrotal area. Pain may be worse in the evening, or after standing for a long time, doing strenuous work or sitting a lot. If the varicocele is large, the patient may experience swelling above the scrotum.(2)
subsection_title: gian tinh mach thung tinh.json. Symptoms of varicocele
subsection_data:
gian tinh mach thung tinh.json. Symptoms of varicocele
Most of the time, varicocele has no specific symptoms. Occasionally, it can cause mild pain or a feeling of heaviness in the scrotal area. Pain may be worse in the evening, or after standing for a long time, doing strenuous work or sitting a lot. If the varicocele is large, the patient may experience swelling above the scrotum.(2)
